posts.cooked_content:
@23f1002630 - thanks for raising this. It’s fixed and won’t re-occur for anyone.

What happened? I picked random duration from the video of 10-40 seconds, but forgot to ensure that the end time should not exceed the video length. That’s what I fixed.
posts.cleaned_text: @23f1002630 - thanks for raising this. It’s fixed and won’t re-occur for anyone. What happened? I picked random duration from the video of 10-40 seconds, but forgot to ensure that the end time should not exceed the video length. That’s what I fixed.
